Uses of Package
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers

  • Packages that use org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers 
    Package Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers
    Provides DatacenterBroker classes that act on behalf of a cloud customer, attending his/her requests for creation and destruction of Cloudlets and VMs, assigning such Cloudlets to specific VMs.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.network  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.power  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.cloudlets
    Provides Cloudlet implementations, that represent an application that will run inside a Vm.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.vms
    Provides implementations of Virtual Machines (Vm) that are a software package that emulate the architecture of a physical machine.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.vms.network  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.vms.power  
    org.cloudsimplus.builders
    Provides Builder classes that implement the Builder Design Pattern to allow instantiating multiple simulation objects more easily.
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers 
    Class and Description
    DatacenterBroker
    Represents a broker acting on behalf of a cloud customer.
    DatacenterBrokerAbstract
    An abstract class to be used as base for implementing a DatacenterBroker.
    DatacenterBrokerHeuristic
    A simple implementation of DatacenterBroker that uses some heuristic to get a suboptimal mapping among submitted cloudlets and Vm's.
    DatacenterBrokerSimple
    A simple implementation of DatacenterBroker that try to host customer's VMs at the first switches found.
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.network 
    Class and Description
    DatacenterBroker
